presets.name: Pop Punk Power Boost
presets.summary: High-gain yet clear rhythm tone for palm-muted riffs and wide-open choruses. Tight low end with just enough fizz to punch through the mix.

presets.name: Pop Punk Shimmer Crunch
presets.summary: A dynamic crunch tone with bright top-end shimmer and midrange punch. Ideal for anthemic choruses and cutting through dense mixes.
